LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_raw ON mc_raw.message_id = m.id AND mc_raw.metadata_id = 0 AND mc_raw.content_type = 'R'
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_processed_raw ON mc_processed_raw.message_id = m.id AND mc_processed_raw.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_processed_raw.content_type = 'P'
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_transformed ON mc_transformed.message_id = m.id AND mc_transformed.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_transformed.content_type = 'T'

LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_response ON mc_response.message_id = m.id AND mc_response.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_response.content_type = 'O'
